DOC.brief_summary: Self-management intervention may decrease symptom burden improve functioning time .
DOC.detailed_description: Self-management intervention ( strategy ) may decrease symptom burden ( sleep disturbance , tiredness ; itch numbness ) improve functioning ( social , physical emotional ) time ( baseline , 3 week 8 week ) .
DOC.criteria: 1. age ≥ 18 year old , 2. HD three time week , 3. receive HD ≥ six month , 4. read write English , 5. telephone service . history dementia , acquire immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ) active cancer , inability give inform consent .
